attributes.action: Regulate price on approved Covid test providers for Travel
attributes.additional_details: The current list is misleading and providers offers do not match the prices on the Government's list.
attributes.background: Revise and mandate price points for different Covid tests

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Increase regulation of covid-19 testing by private companies.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593541
